The quagga was a subspecies of zebra that was once found in large numbers in South Africa but became extinct in the late 19th century due to overhunting and habitat loss.', 'Thylacine - Also known as the Tasmanian Tiger, the thylacine was a carnivorous marsupial that lived in Australia until the early 20th century when it became extinct due to hunting by humans and competition with other predators.', 'Haast Eagle -
